PATIENT_ID: TEST_RIB_EDGE_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 16:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 16:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 72-year-old male, pedestrian struck.
BP 80/50, HR 140, RR 30, GCS 6.
Active hemorrhage. Massive transfusion protocol activated.
Severe traumatic brain injury with GCS 6.
Rib fractures palpated on left chest wall.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-21 16:30:00
CT Chest/Abdomen/Pelvis: Fractures of left ribs 3, 4, 5, 6, 7.
Left hemothorax. Splenic laceration grade IV.
CT Head: Subdural hematoma with midline shift.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-21 16:45:00
Patient in hemorrhagic shock. Active resuscitation ongoing.
Respiratory rate 30 breaths per minute.
No incentive spirometry possible due to clinical status.
Pain assessment: unable to assess, patient intubated and sedated.
